salpingo-oophorectomy, omentectomy, peritoneal biopsies, and evaluation of suspicious lymph nodes similar to
non-pregnancy state.
• Both laparoscopy and laparotomy are accepted procedures.
• Certain chemotherapeutic drugs can be given safely in the second and third trimester for epithelial ovarian cancer.
• Unless indicated, delivery should be by vaginal route in women who were surgically treated for ovarian cancer in
the early trimester.
